column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////i got the cha cha cha ramen with the gyoza combo. the gyoza was very bland and forgetful also
column2: almost tasted like they were frozen previously. both of our house salads were over dressed and forgetful. my cha cha cha ramen saved jinya from a 1 star rating Â because the broth was nicely seasoned
column3: and noodles were cooked very well. the meat was EXTREMELY salty though.
